greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of psi(x)^2 * psi(-x^3)^2 / (phi(-x^4) * psi(-x^6)) in power of x where phi(), psi() are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of f(-x^8) * f(x, x^5)^2 / psi(-x^6) in powers of x where psi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
Expansion of q^(-1/4) * eta(q^2)^4 * eta(q^3)^2 * eta(q^8) * eta(q^12)^3 / (eta(q)^2 * eta(q^4)^2 * eta(q^6)^3 * eta(q^24)) in powers of q.
mathematica: a[n_]:= SeriesCoefficient[(-1)^(-1/8)*q^(-1/4)*(EllipticTheta[2, 0, Sqrt[q]]*EllipticTheta[2, 0, I*Sqrt[q^3]])^2/(8*EllipticTheta[3, 0, -q^4]*EllipticTheta[2, 0, I*q^3]), {q, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 04 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^4 * eta(x^3 + A)^2 * eta(x^8 + A) * eta(x^12 + A)^3 / (eta(x + A)^2 * eta(x^4 + A)^2 * eta(x^6 + A)^3 * eta(x^24 + A)), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 08 2015
